Class FootballClub

java.lang.Object
  FootballClub

public class FootballClub
extends java.lang.Object

Class FootballClub is a composite class representing a real-world club. It has attributes of name, the year founded and manager. The manager attribute is an object of the Manager class. TMA02 Q2

Version:
10th January 2019
Author:
Wayne Sandford

getYearFounded

public java.lang.String getYearFounded()
Getter for football club's yearFounded. Returns "Unknown" if yearFounded has not been set.

isOverHundred

public boolean isOverHundred()
Return true if the football club is one hundred or more years old. Returns false if yearFounded is not set.

setManagerName

public void setManagerName(java.lang.String aManagerName)
Setter for football club's managerName. managerName is attribute of Manager object, so is forwarded to component class.

setManagerYearBecameManager

public void setManagerYearBecameManager(java.lang.String aManagerYearBecameManager)
Setter for football club's manager yearBecameManager. Manager yearBecameManager is attribute of Manager object, so is forwarded to component class.

public java.lang.String toString()
Returns a string describing the football club object.

Overrides:
toString in class java.lang.Object

yearsManaged

public void yearsManaged()
Computes the amount of whole years the manager has managed at the football club. It uses the yearBecameManager attribute from the Manager object in its calculation.
